id.description: The unique identifier of the opportunity.

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign linked to the opportunity.

value.description: The monetary value associated with the opportunity.

probability.description: The probability of successful closure of the opportunity.

type.description: The type of opportunity (e.g., new business, upsell, renewal).

stage.description: The current stage of the opportunity in the sales process.

status.description: The status of the opportunity (e.g., open, closed-won, closed-lost).

closed_at.description: The date and time when the opportunity was closed.

created_at.description: The date and time when the opportunity was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the opportunity was last updated.
